TopicTitle: M S p a i n t b o y s

**Edited <time datetime="2015-04-01T10:31:13Z" title="04/01/2015 10:31  AM" data-short="9 yr">April 1, 2015</time> by katateochi**
MS Paint is what pros use for image editing. Photoshop, the Gimp, and paint.net make it easier for newbs, it's like the MechJeb of image editing.

>
